/* move to global setting */

  padding-top: 0; }

html[data-page-template] div.livewhale-calendar.section h2.event-title,
html[data-page-template] div.livewhale-calendar.section h2.event-title a {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  line-height: 2.4rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #414042; }
  html[data-page-template] #lw_cal h2.event-title:hover, html[data-page-template] #lw_cal h2.event-title a:hover,
  html[data-page-template] div.livewhale-calendar.section h2.event-title:hover,
  html[data-page-template] div.livewhale-calendar.section h2.event-title a:hover {
    color: #cc0633; }

  html[data-page-template] div.livewhale-calendar.section h2.event-title:hover,
  html[data-page-template] div.livewhale-calendar.section h2.event-title a:hover {
    color: #cc0633 !important;
    background: none;
    text-decoration: none; }

.clf-fdi {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 2fr 3fr;
  grid-gap: 3rem;
  padding-top: 12px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e6e7e8;
  padding-bottom: 4.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem; }
  @media (min-width: 1150px) {
    .clf-fdi {
      float: left;
      width: 48%;
      margin-left: 1%; } }

.clf-fdi__image img {
  max-width: 100%;
  padding-top: 0; }

.clf-fdi__image a:hover {
  background: none; }

  display: inline-block;
  padding-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  line-height: 2.4rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #414042; }
  .clf-fdi__profile .faculty-name:hover {
    color: #cc0633; }
  .clf-fdi__profile .faculty-name:hover {
    text-decoration: none; }

  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  display: block; }

  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 1rem; }

  margin-right: 1.5rem; }

  clear: both; }

      padding-top: 0; }

  .page-content__main ul.clf-list.configurable-list.date-overlay.date-above .configurable-list__image--overlay, .page-content__main ul.clf-list.configurable-list.date-overlay.date-above .configurable-list__image--date {
    top: 0; }
  .page-content__main ul.clf-list.configurable-list.date-overlay.date-above .configurable-list__title {
    grid-row: 1; }

.page-content__main div.red.block ul.clf-list.configurable-list li .configurable-list__title a {
  color: #ffffff; }
  .page-content__main div.red.block ul.clf-list.configurable-list li .configurable-list__title a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline; }

ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack li {
  grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
  @media (min-width: 528px) {
    ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack li .configurable-list__image {
      grid-column: 1 / -1;
      grid-row: 3; }
    ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack li .configurable-list__title {
      grid-column: 1 / -1;
      grid-row: 1;
      margin-top: 1.5rem; }
    ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack li .configurable-list__date {
      grid-column: 1 / -1;
      grid-row: 2; }
      ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack li .configurable-list__date p {
        line-height: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1rem;
        margin-bottom: 2rem; }
    ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack li .configurable-list__description {
      grid-column: 1 / -1;
      grid-row: 4;
      margin-top: 0; } }

  ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack.date-above .configurable-list__title {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 2;
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 1rem; }

    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 1; }
    ul.clf-list.configurable-list.stack.date-above .configurable-list__date p {
      line-height: 1rem;
      margin-bottom: 1rem; } }

    margin-bottom: 2rem; } }

    margin-bottom: 0; } }

      background: #a6192e;
      box-shadow: -1rem 0 0 #a6192e; }

.page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h1, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h2, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h3, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h4, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h5, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h1, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h2, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h3, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h4, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h5 {
  box-shadow: none; }
  .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h1:hover, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h2:hover, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h3:hover, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h4:hover, .page-content__main .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h5:hover, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h1:hover, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h2:hover, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h3:hover, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h4:hover, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.header.text-right.background-blk a h5:hover {
    background: transparent;
    box-shadow: none; }

  margin-bottom: 0; }

  padding-left: 3rem; }

    .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text {
      padding-left: 3rem; } }

    padding-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 5.5rem; }
  .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text a, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text a {
    text-decoration: none; }
    .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text a:hover, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text a:hover {
      background-color: transparent; }
      .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text a:hover h3, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text a:hover h3 {
        color: #cc0633; }
  .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text h3, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text h3 {
    display: inline-block;
    font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
    font-size: 4.4rem;
    line-height: 1;
    color: #cc0633;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
    font-size: 3.6rem;
    line-height: 3.8rem;
    letter-spacing: normal;
    color: #414042;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
    text-transform: uppercase; }
    @media (min-width: 528px) {
      .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text h3, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text h3 {
        font-size: 3.6rem;
        line-height: 3.8rem; } }
    @media (min-width: 528px) {
      .page-content__main .flexslider.news .carousel-text h3, .page-content__third-col .flexslider.news .carousel-text h3 {
        padding-top: 2rem; } }

      color: #414042; }

        color: #cc0633;
        background: none;
        text-decoration: none; }

      margin-top: 0; }

      font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
      display: inline-block;
      background: #cc0633;
      color: #ffffff;
      border: 1px solid #cc0633;
      font-size: 1.6rem;
      padding: 1.2rem 4rem;
      text-align: center;
      text-transform: uppercase; }

/* move to global setting */
html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools {
  border-top: 1px solid #e6e7e8;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e6e7e8;
  margin-bottom: 3rem; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div {
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
    html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div::before {
      content: 'share this';
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin-top: 1.5rem;
      display: block;
      font-size: 1.4rem;
      font-family: "PFDINTextPro";
      line-height: 1.7rem;
      margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
    html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div span {
      display: inline-block;
      padding-bottom: 0.5rem; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div span::after {
        content: '';
        display: block; }
    html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets {
      background: none;
      overflow: hidden;
      color: #6d6f71;
      text-decoration: underline;
      font-size: 1.4rem; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets:hover {
        color: #cc0633;
        background: none;
        text-decoration: underline; }
        html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets:hover:before {
          color: #cc0633;
          background: none;
          text-decoration: underline;
          text-decoration: none; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets::before {
        font-family: "FontAwesome";
        color: #6d6f71;
        text-decoration: underline;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 1.6rem;
        margin-right: .5rem; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.twitter {
        padding-left: 2rem; }
        @media (min-width: 528px) {
          html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.twitter {
            padding-left: 0; } }
        html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.twitter:before {
          display: inline-block;
          content: "\f099"; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.facebook:before {
        display: inline-block;
        content: "\f09a"; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.pinterest:before {
        display: inline-block;
        content: "\f0d2"; }
      html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.email:before {
        display: inline-block;
        content: "\f0e0"; }

html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link {
  background: none;
  margin-left: 0;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  text-transform: none;
  color: #6d6f71;
  text-decoration: underline; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link:hover {
    background: transparent;
    opacity: 1;
    color: #cc0633;
    background: none;
    text-decoration: underline;
    font-size: 1.4rem; }
    html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link:hover:before {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: underline;
      text-decoration: none; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link::before {
    font-family: "FontAwesome";
    content: "\f02f";
    font-size: 1.6rem;
    display: inline-block;
    color: #414042;
    color: #6d6f71;
    text-decoration: underline;
    text-decoration: none;
    margin-right: 0.5rem; }

html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools &gt; div span .chicklets {
  color: #ffffff; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools &gt; div span .chicklets:hover {
    opacity: 1;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: underline; }
    html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools &gt; div span .chicklets:hover:before {
      color: #ffffff; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools &gt; div span .chicklets::before {
    color: #ffffff; }

html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link {
  color: #ffffff; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link:hover {
    color: #ffffff; }
    html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link:hover:before {
      color: #ffffff; }
  html:not([data-news-template]) div.block.red .documenttools a.multi-channel-print-link::before {
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: none; }

/* move to global setting */

  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 2.4rem;
  line-height: 2.6rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  html[data-page-type='faculty-profile'] h2 a, html[data-page-type='faculty-profile'] h3.course-header a {
    color: #414042; }
    html[data-page-type='faculty-profile'] h2 a:hover, html[data-page-type='faculty-profile'] h3.course-header a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

  background: #f5f5f5;
  padding: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 5rem;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(11, 1fr 30px) 1fr; }

    .page-content__main .faculty-profile-container .faculty-profile-card {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }
  @media (min-width: 754px) {
    .page-content__main .faculty-profile-container .faculty-profile-card {
      grid-template-rows: repeat(2, min-content) auto; } }

  grid-template-columns: 1fr; }

  display: none; }

/* move to global setting */
html[data-news-template] .page-content__main {
  /* grid set up */ }
  html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .news-content {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
    @media (min-width: 754px) {
      html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .news-content {
        grid-template-columns: 3fr 1fr;
        grid-gap: 3rem; } }
    html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .news-content .main_content {
      grid-column: 1 / 1;
      grid-row: 1; }
    html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .news-content .news-content__doctools {
      grid-column: 2 / -1;
      grid-row: 1; }
      html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .news-content .news-content__doctools .new.section {
        position: absolute;
        top: -1000%; }

html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content div.category &gt; h4 {
  color: #ffffff;
  background: #cc0633;
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 0 .5rem 0 0;
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  line-height: 1;
  font-family: "countach-bold";
  letter-spacing: normal;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content h1 {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  line-height: 3.8rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-transform: none;
  margin-bottom: 1rem; }
  html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content h1 a {
    color: #414042; }
    html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content h1 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .datestamp {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 3rem; }
  html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .datestamp &gt; div {
    font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
    background: #e6e7e8;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0 .5rem 0 0;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: normal;
    font-size: 1.6rem;
    color: #a7a9ac; }

  /* share this over-writes */
  /* custom share tools */ }
  html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools {
    width: auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e6e7e8;
    border-top: 1px solid #e6e7e8;
    margin-bottom: 3rem; }
    html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools &gt; div {
      margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
      html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools &gt; div span {
        display: inline-block;
        padding-top: 0.3rem; }
        @media (max-width: 527px) {
          html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools &gt; div span {
            display: inline-block;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
            html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools &gt; div span::after {
              content: '';
              display: block; } }
      html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets {
        background: none;
        padding-left: 0;
        margin-right: 1.5rem;
        font-size: 1.4rem;
        font-family: "PFDINTextPro";
        color: #6d6f71;
        text-decoration: underline; }

          opacity: 1;
          color: #cc0633;
          background: none;
          text-decoration: underline; }

            color: #cc0633;
            background: none;
            text-decoration: underline; }

          font-family: "FontAwesome";
          font-size: 1.6rem;
          margin-left: 0;
          margin-right: 0.5rem;
          color: #6d6f71;
          text-decoration: underline;
          text-decoration: none; }
          @media (max-width: 979px) {

              margin-right: 0.5rem; } }

          text-decoration: none;
          display: inline-block;
          content: "\f099"; }

          text-decoration: none;
          display: inline-block;
          content: "\f09a"; }

          text-decoration: none;
          display: inline-block;
          content: "\f0d2"; }
        html[data-news-template] .page-content__main .main_content .documenttools &gt; div .chicklets.email:before {
          text-decoration: none;
          display: inline-block;
          content: "\f0e0"; }

    background: none;

  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 100%;
  border: none;
  margin-top: 0; }

    display: block; }

    width: 2rem;
    overflow: hidden; }

  padding: unset; }

  background: #f5f5f5; }
  .main__content div.block.grey.alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.grey .alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-1-grey .c1.alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-1-grey .c1 .alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-2-grey .c2.alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-2-grey .c2 .alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-3-grey .c3.alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-3-grey .c3 .alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-4-grey .c4.alternate table tr:nth-child(even), .main__content div.block.col-4-grey .c4 .alternate table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background: #ffffff; }

.main__content div.block.red, .main__content div.block.col-1-red .c1, .main__content div.block.col-2-red .c2, .main__content div.block.col-3-red .c3, .main__content div.block.col-4-red .c4 {
  background: #a6192e;
  color: #ffffff; }
  .main__content div.block.red a, .main__content div.block.col-1-red .c1 a, .main__content div.block.col-2-red .c2 a, .main__content div.block.col-3-red .c3 a, .main__content div.block.col-4-red .c4 a {
    text-decoration: underline; }
    .main__content div.block.red a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-1-red .c1 a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-2-red .c2 a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-3-red .c3 a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-4-red .c4 a:hover {
      text-decoration: underline; }

  .main__content div.block.red.toggle:before, .main__content div.block.red .toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-1-red .c1.toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-1-red .c1 .toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-2-red .c2.toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-2-red .c2 .toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-3-red .c3.toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-3-red .c3 .toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-4-red .c4.toggle:before, .main__content div.block.col-4-red .c4 .toggle:before {
    color: #ffffff; }
  .main__content div.block.red.toggle h1, .main__content div.block.red.toggle h2, .main__content div.block.red.toggle h3, .main__content div.block.red.toggle h4, .main__content div.block.red.toggle   color: #cc0633; }

  text-decoration: none; }
  .main__content div.textimage:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.block.red &gt; div.text .js-textimage-heading-container a h1, .main__content div.textimage:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.block.red &gt; div.text .js-textimage-heading-container a h2, .main__content div.textimage:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.block.red &gt; div.text .js-textimage-heading-container a h3, .main__content div.textimage:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.block.red &gt; div.text .js-textimage-heading-container a h4, .main__content div.textimage:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.block.red &gt; div.text .js-textimage-heading-container a h5 {
    color: #a6192e;
    background: transparent;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-decoration: none; }

    color: #ffffff;
    background: transparent; }

/* move to global setting */
div.download {
  margin-bottom: 3rem; }
  div.download span[class*="icon type_"] + a:before {
    font-family: "FontAwesome";
    text-decoration: none;
    background: none;
    margin-top: .2rem;
    padding: 0.2rem 1rem 0.2rem 0;
    margin-left: -0.5rem;
    font-size: 2.5rem; }
    div.download span[class*="icon type_"] + a:before &gt; img {
      display: none; }
  div.download span[class*="icon type_"] + a:before {
    content: "\f15c";
    color: #6d6f71;
    text-decoration: underline; }
  div.download span + a:hover:before {
    color: #cc0633;
    background: transparent; }
  div.download span.type_doc + a:before, div.download span.type_docx + a:before {
    content: "\f1c2"; }
  div.download span.type_eps + a:before, div.download span.type_gif + a:before, div.download span.type_jpg + a:before, div.download span.type_tif + a:before, div.download span.type_png + a:before, div.download span.type_jpeg + a:before {
    content: "\f1c5"; }
  div.download span.type_pdf + a:before {
    content: "\f1c1"; }
  div.download span.type_ppt + a:before, div.download span.type_pptx + a:before {
    content: "\f1c4"; }
  div.download span.type_txt + a:before {
    content: "\f0f6"; }
  div.download span.type_xls + a:before, div.download span.type_xlsx + a:before {
    content: "\f1c3"; }
  div.download span.type_zip, div.download span.type_rar, div.download span.type_tar + a:before {
    content: "\f1c6"; }
  div.download span.type_mp3, div.download span.type_wav, div.download span.type_wma + a:before {
    content: "\f1c7"; }
  div.download span.type_mpg + a:before, div.download span.type_mov + a:before, div.download span.type_mp4 + a:before {
    content: "\f1c8"; }
  div.download span.type_css + a:before, div.download span.type_js + a:before, div.download span.type_html + a:before {
    content: "\f1c9"; }

div.download &gt; div.red.block a {
  color: #ffffff; }
  div.download &gt; div.red.block a:before {
    color: #ffffff; }
  div.download &gt; div.red.block a:hover {
    background: transparent;
    color: #ffffff; }
    div.download &gt; div.red.block a:hover:before {
      color: #ffffff;
      background: transparent; }

div.sfu-columns.block.red div.download a {
  color: #ffffff; }
  div.sfu-columns.block.red div.download a:before {
    color: #ffffff; }
  div.sfu-columns.block.red div.download a:hover {
    background: transparent;
    color: #ffffff; }
    div.sfu-columns.block.red div.download a:hover:before {
      color: #ffffff;
      background: transparent; }

div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.download a {
  color: #ffffff; }
  div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.download a:before {
    color: #ffffff; }
  div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.download a:hover {
    background: transparent;
    color: #ffffff; }
    div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.download a:hover:before {
      color: #ffffff;
      background: transparent; }

/* move to global setting */
.icon {
  display: inline-block;
  font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
  font-size: inherit;
  text-rendering: auto;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; }

.page-content__main h1, .page-content__third-col h1 {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 4.8rem;
  line-height: 5.2rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  @media (max-width: 527px) {
    .page-content__main h1, .page-content__third-col h1 {
      font-size: 4.8rem;
      line-height: 5.2rem; } }
  .page-content__main h1 a, .page-content__third-col h1 a {
    color: #414042; }
    .page-content__main h1 a:hover, .page-content__third-col h1 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

.page-content__main h2, .page-content__third-col h2 {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  line-height: 3.8rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .page-content__main h2 a, .page-content__third-col h2 a {
    color: #414042; }
    .page-content__main h2 a:hover, .page-content__third-col h2 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

.page-content__main h3, .page-content__third-col h3 {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 2.4rem;
  line-height: 2.6rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .page-content__main h3 a, .page-content__third-col h3 a {
    color: #414042; }
    .page-content__main h3 a:hover, .page-content__third-col h3 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

.page-content__main h4, .page-content__third-col h4 {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 2rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  line-height: 2.2rem;
  color: #6d6f71;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .page-content__main h4 a, .page-content__third-col h4 a {
    color: #6d6f71; }
    .page-content__main h4 a:hover, .page-content__third-col h4 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

.page-content__main h5, .page-content__third-col h5 {
  font-family: "PFDINTextPro";
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  line-height: 2.0rem;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .page-content__main h5 a, .page-content__third-col h5 a {
    color: #414042; }
    .page-content__main h5 a:hover, .page-content__third-col h5 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

.page-content__main p, .page-content__main ul, .page-content__main blockquote, .page-content__main ol, .page-content__main img, .page-content__third-col p, .page-content__third-col ul, .page-content__third-col blockquote, .page-content__third-col ol, .page-content__third-col img {
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  letter-spacing: .025rem;
  line-height: 2.6rem; }

.page-content__main p.intro, .page-content__third-col p.intro {
  font-size: 2.4rem;
  line-height: 3.6rem; }

.page-content__main a, .page-content__third-col a {
  color: #6d6f71;
  text-decoration: underline; }
  .page-content__main a:hover, .page-content__third-col a:hover {
    color: #cc0633;
    background: none;
    text-decoration: underline; }

.page-content__main div.image a:hover, .page-content__third-col div.image a:hover {
  background: transparent; }

.page-content__main sub, .page-content__third-col sub {
  vertical-align: unset;
  font-size: inherit;
  text-transform: lowercase; }

.page-content__main b, .page-content__main strong, .page-content__third-col b, .page-content__third-col strong {
  font-family: "PFDINTextProBold"; }

/* move to global setting */
.main__content .clndr .filter {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid #cc0633;
  color: #cc0633;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  padding: 1.2rem 4rem;
  text-align: center;
  display: inline-block;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  width: 100%;
  border-bottom: 0; }
  .main__content .clndr .filter:hover {
    background: #cc0633;
    color: #ffffff; }

.main__content .clndr ul, .main__content .clndr ul.events {
  padding: 0; }
  .main__content .clndr ul li, .main__content .clndr ul.events li {
    padding: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .main__content .clndr ul li:before, .main__content .clndr ul.events li:before {
      content: unset; }

.main__content .clndr .today {
  border-color: #a6192e; }

.main__content .clndr .event-day {
  padding-top: 2.5rem; }

  font-size: unset; }

  line-height: 2.6rem; }

  background-image: none;
  background-color: #cc0633;
  color: #ffffff; }

    background: #cc0633; }

      border-left-color: #cc0633; }

      text-decoration: underline; } }

      display: block; } }

  display: inline; }
  .main__content .clndr .event-summary:hover {
    background: #cc0633; }

.page-content__main {
  /*# sourceMappingURL=sfu-forms.css.map */ }
  .page-content__main form {
    margin: 1em 0;
    border: 1px solid #D2E1E6;
    border-radius: 3px 3px 3px 3px;
    padding: 0.8em;
    background-color: #E9EFF1; }
    .page-content__main form select {
      -moz-appearance: none;
      background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #F5F5F5 0%, #E0E0E0 100%);
      border: 1px solid #AAA;
      cursor: pointer; }
    .page-content__main form select, .page-content__main form option {
      height: 1.75em; }
  .page-content__main fieldset, .page-content__main label, .page-content__main input, .page-content__main textarea, .page-content__main select {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    font-family: "PFDINTextPro";
    font-size: 1.8rem; }
  .page-content__main input[type="text"], .page-content__main input[type="password"], .page-content__main input[type="date"], .page-content__main input[type="datetime-local"], .page-content__main .searchwidget input, .page-content__main .search.section input, .page-content__main textarea, .page-content__main select {
    max-width: 30em; }
  .page-content__main fieldset, .page-content__main label, .page-content__main .form_row button {
    margin: 1em 0 0.2em;
    padding: 0; }
  .page-content__main input[type="text"], .page-content__main input[type="password"], .page-content__main .searchwidget input:first-child, .page-content__main .search.section input:first-child {
    height: 2.25em;
    padding: 0 0 0 0.4em; }
  .page-content__main input[type="date"], .page-content__main input[type="datetime-local"] {
    line-height: 1.625; }
  .page-content__main textarea {
    overflow: auto;
    vertical-align: top;
    padding: 0.25em 0 0 0.4em;
    min-height: 4em;
    height: auto;
    line-height: inherit; }
  .page-content__main .checkbox-group label, .page-content__main .radio-group label {
    padding-left: 1.5em; }

    float: left;
    clear: left;
    width: auto;
    margin-bottom: 0; }

    margin-bottom: 0.2em; }

    width: auto;

    float: left;

/* move to global setting */
.main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  row-gap: 0; }
  .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.image img {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.image img small {
      margin-top: -1.5rem; }
    @media (min-width: 980px) {
      .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.image img {
        margin-bottom: 3rem; } }
  @media (min-width: 980px) {
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) {
      grid-gap: 3rem;
      row-gap: 0;
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr; }
      .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]).img-right {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }
  .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.clear {
    display: none; }

.main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1,
.main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 {
  margin-bottom: 3rem; }
  .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a,
  .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a {
    text-decoration: none; }
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a:hover h1,
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a:hover h1 {
      background: transparent;
      color: #cc0633; }

.main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(11, 1fr 30px) 1fr;
  grid-template-columns: minmax(min-content, max-content); }
  @media (min-width: 980px) {
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight {
      grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr; } }
  .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.image {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.image small {
      margin-top: .5rem; }
      @media (min-width: 980px) {
        .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.image small {
          margin-top: 1.5rem; } }
  @media (min-width: 980px) {
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text {
      grid-column: 1 / 1;
      grid-row: 1;
      padding-right: 3rem; }
    .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.image {
      grid-column: 2 / 24;
      grid-row: 1;
      margin-bottom: 0; }
      .main__content div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.image img {
        padding-top: 0; } }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div.overlay h1 {
  color: #414042; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div.overlay h2 {
  color: #414042; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div.overlay h3 {
  color: #414042; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div.overlay h4 {
  color: #6d6f71; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div.overlay h5 {
  color: #414042; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div.overlay p {
  color: #000000; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1,
.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 {
  margin-bottom: 3rem; }
  .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a,
  .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #ffffff; }
    .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a:hover h1,
    .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.red.block div.textimage &gt; div:not([class*=overlay]) &gt; div.floatRight &gt; div.text div.js-textimage-heading-container.h1 a:hover h1 {
      background: transparent;
      color: #ffffff;
      text-decoration: underline; }

/* move to global setting */
.main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner {
  display: grid;
  grid-gap: 0; }
  @media (min-width: 980px) {
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.image {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 1;
    display: inherit; }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.image a {
      display: inherit; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 1; }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h5 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text p a {
      display: inline;
      text-decoration: none;
      color: #cc0633; }
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h5 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text p a:hover {
        background: transparent;
        color: #cc0633; }

  margin-top: 1.5rem;
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid #cc0633;
  color: #cc0633;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  padding: 1.2rem 4rem;
  text-align: center;
  display: inline-block;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

    background: #cc0633;
    color: #ffffff; }

      background: transparent;
      color: #ffffff;
      border-color: #ffffff; }
      .main__content div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.button &gt; div.text p a:hover {
        background: #ffffff;
        color: #cc0633; } }

        background: transparent;

  display: block; }

      content: '';
      margin-left: -0.4rem; }

      color: #ffffff; }

.main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right {
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.image {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 1; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text {
    grid-column: 2 / -1;
    grid-row: 1;
    justify-items: end;
    text-align: right;
    width: auto; }
    @media (min-width: 980px) {
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text {
        padding-top: 20%; } }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h5 {
      white-space: break-spaces; }
      @media (min-width: 980px) {
        .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h5 {
          box-shadow: -1rem 0 0 #cc0633; } }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text p {
      text-align: left;
      right: 3rem;
      margin-left: 0; }
    @media (max-width: 979px) {
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text {
        grid-column: 1 / -1;
        grid-row: 2;
        justify-items: start;
        text-align: left; } }

@media (min-width: 980px) {
  .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h2, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h3, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h4, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.text-right &gt; div.text h5 {
    box-shadow: -1rem 0 0 #a6192e; } }

@media (max-width: 979px) {
  .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h2, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h5 {
    background-color: #a6192e; } }

@media (min-width: 980px) {
  .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1 h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1 h2, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.text h1 h5, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h2 h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h2 h2, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.text h2 h5, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 h2, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 h3, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 h4, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3 h5, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4 h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4 h2, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4 h3, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4 h4, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h5 h5 {
    background-color: #a6192e; } }

  .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1 h1, .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1 h2, .main__content a:hover &gt;   text-decoration: none; }
  .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h1, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h2, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h3, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h4, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text h5, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text p {
    background-color: #a6192e; }

    .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner &gt; div.text p {
      background-color: #ffffff;
      box-shadow: none; } }

    display: none; }

    padding-top: .5rem; } }

/* move to global setting */
.main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom {
  grid-gap: 0; }
  @media (min-width: 980px) {
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.image {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 1;
    display: inherit; }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.image a {
      display: inherit; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
    grid-row: 1; }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p a {
      display: inline-block;
      text-decoration: none;
      color: #cc0633; }
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p a:hover {
        background: transparent;
        color: #cc0633; }

.main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p a:hover {
    color: #ffffff; }

  align-self: end;
  background: #cc0633;
  padding: 1rem 1.7rem; }
  .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p {

    line-height: 2rem;
    letter-spacing: normal;
    color: #ffffff;
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h5 a, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text p a {
      letter-spacing: normal;
      color: #ffffff; }
      .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a h1, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a h2, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt; div.text h1 a h3, .main__content div.overlay-bottom &gt;         color: #ffffff; }

/* move to global setting */
@media (min-width: 980px) {
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay {
    display: grid;
    grid-gap: 0;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }

  grid-column: 1 / -1;
  grid-row: 1;
  display: inherit; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.image a {
    display: inherit; }

.main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text {
  grid-column: 1 / -1;
  grid-row: 1; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text p {

      display: inline-block;
      text-decoration: none;
      color: #cc0633; }
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text p a:hover {
        background: transparent;
        color: #cc0633; }

.main__content div.textimage div.overlay {
  margin-bottom: 3rem; }
  .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text {
    width: 100%;
    align-self: end;
    background: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem 3rem; }
    @media (min-width: 980px) {
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text {
        width: 55%; } }
    @media (max-width: 979px) {
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text {
        grid-row: 2; }
        .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 {
          line-height: 1;
          margin-bottom: 0; } }
    @media (max-width: 979px) {
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text {
        border: 1px solid #a7a9ac;
        border-top: 0;
        padding: 1rem 1.5rem; } }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 {
      font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
      font-size: 3.6rem;
      line-height: 3.8rem;
      letter-spacing: normal;
      color: #414042;
      margin-bottom: 3rem;
      text-transform: uppercase; }
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a {
        color: #414042; }
        .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a:hover {
          color: #cc0633;
          background: none;
          text-decoration: none; }
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 + p:first-of-type, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 + p, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 + p:first-of-type, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 + p, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 + p:first-of-type, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 + p, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 + p:first-of-type, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 + p, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 + p:first-of-type, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 + p {
        padding-top: 1rem; }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text p {
      line-height: 2.6rem; }
      .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text p a {
        color: #000000;
        display: inline; }
    .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text h5, .main__content div.textimage div.overlay &gt; div.text p {
      margin-bottom: 0; }

  background: #ffffff; }

    color: #cc0633; }

    .main__content a:hover &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text {
      border-color: #cc0633; } }

  text-decoration: none; }
  .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay .text h1, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay .text h2, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay .text h3, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay .text h4, .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay .text h5 {
    color: #414042;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    line-height: 1; }

    margin-top: 0rem; }
    .main__content a.js-overlay-wrapper-link &gt; div.textimage &gt; div.overlay .text p::after {
      font-family: "FontAwesome";
      content: "\f061";
      margin-left: 1rem; }

    color: #cc0633; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h5, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h1, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h2, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h3, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h4, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  line-height: 3.8rem;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  color: #414042;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a {
    color: #414042; }
    .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h1 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h2 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h3 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h4 a:hover, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text h5 a:hover {
      color: #cc0633;
      background: none;
      text-decoration: none; }

.main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.red div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text p, .main__content div.sfu-columns &gt; div.block.grey div.textimage &gt; div.overlay &gt; div.text p {

    position: relative;
    padding-top: 10%;
    width: 40%; } }

  text-transform: uppercase; }
  @media (min-width: 754px) {
    html[data-page-template='basic-home'] .main__content .page-content.single-col div.sfu-columns &gt; div[data-col-layout='100'][data-row-full-width] &gt; div.c1 div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.small &gt; div.text p {
      font-size: 6rem;
      padding: 0 1rem 1rem 0; } }
  @media (min-width: 980px) {
    html[data-page-template='basic-home'] .main__content .page-content.single-col div.sfu-columns &gt; div[data-col-layout='100'][data-row-full-width] &gt; div.c1 div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.small &gt; div.text p {
      font-size: 7.2rem; } }

  display: block; }
  html[data-page-template='basic-home'] .main__content .page-content.single-col div.sfu-columns &gt; div[data-col-layout='100'][data-row-full-width] &gt; div.c1 div.textimage &gt; div.overlay-banner.button &gt; div.text p + p ~ p {
    display: none; }

  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  background: transparent;

  color: #cc0633;

  text-align: center;
  display: inline-block;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  background: #ffffff; }

    background: #cc0633;

    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; }

      text-align: right;
      width: auto;
      padding-top: 20%; }

        right: 0;

          text-align: right;
          margin-left: 0;
          padding: 0;
          display: none;
          position: absolute; } }

  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid #cc0633;
  color: #cc0633;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  padding: 1.2rem 4rem;
  text-align: center;
  display: inline-block;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .main__content div.button p:last-child a:hover, .main__content div.button-full p:last-child a:hover {
    background: #cc0633;
    color: #ffffff; }

  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  display: inline-block;
  background: #cc0633;
  color: #ffffff;
  border: 1px solid #cc0633;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  padding: 1.2rem 4rem;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .main__content div.button.alt p:last-child a:hover, .main__content div.button-full.alt p:last-child a:hover {
    color: #cc0633;
    background: transparent;
    border-color: #cc0633; }

  width: 100%;
  display: block; }

/* move to global setting */
.main__content div.quote, .page-content__main div.quote {
  margin-top: 3rem;
  padding-left: 1.5rem; }
  .main__content div.quote a, .page-content__main div.quote a {
    text-decoration: underline; }
    .main__content div.quote a:hover, .page-content__main div.quote a:hover {
      text-decoration: underline; }
  .main__content div.quote p, .page-content__main div.quote p {
    background-color: #cc0633;
    font-family: "PFDINTextProMedium";
    line-height: 3.6rem;
    color: #ffffff;
    display: inline;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    line-height: 3.8rem;
    font-size: 2.4rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
    padding-left: 0px;
    box-shadow: -16px 0 0 #cc0633; }
    .main__content div.quote p a, .page-content__main div.quote p a {
      color: #ffffff;
      text-decoration: underline; }
  .main__content div.quote h5, .page-content__main div.quote h5 {
    color: #000000;
    margin-left: -1.5rem;
    padding-top: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    line-height: 2.2rem;
    letter-spacing: .025rem;
    text-transform: none;
    font-family: "PFDINTextPro"; }
    .main__content div.quote h5 strong, .main__content div.quote h5 b, .page-content__main div.quote h5 strong, .page-content__main div.quote h5 b {
      font-family: "PFDINTextProBold"; }
      .main__content div.quote h5 strong:hover, .main__content div.quote h5 b:hover, .page-content__main div.quote h5 strong:hover, .page-content__main div.quote h5 b:hover {
        text-decoration: underline; }

  background-color: #ffffff;
  color: #cc0633;
  box-shadow: -16px 0 0 #ffffff; }
  .main__content div.block.red div.quote p a, .main__content div.block.col-1-red &gt; div.c1 div.quote p a, .main__content div.block.col-2-red &gt; div.c2 div.quote p a, .main__content div.block.col-3-red &gt; div.c3 div.quote p a, .main__content div.block.col-4-red &gt; div.c4 div.quote p a, .page-content__main div.block.red div.quote p a, .page-content__main div.block.col-1-red &gt; div.c1 div.quote p a, .page-content__main div.block.col-2-red &gt; div.c2 div.quote p a, .page-content__main div.block.col-3-red &gt; div.c3 div.quote p a, .page-content__main div.block.col-4-red &gt; div.c4 div.quote p a {
    color: #cc0633; }
    .main__content div.block.red div.quote p a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-1-red &gt; div.c1 div.quote p a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-2-red &gt; div.c2 div.quote p a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-3-red &gt; div.c3 div.quote p a:hover, .main__content div.block.col-4-red &gt; div.c4 div.quote p a:hover, .page-content__main div.block.red div.quote p a:hover, .page-content__main div.block.col-1-red &gt; div.c1 div.quote p a:hover, .page-content__main div.block.col-2-red &gt; div.c2 div.quote p a:hover, .page-content__main div.block.col-3-red &gt; div.c3 div.quote p a:hover, .page-content__main div.block.col-4-red &gt; div.c4 div.quote p a:hover {
      background-color: transparent;
      color: #cc0633; }

    box-shadow: none; }

    line-height: auto; }

/* move to global setting */
.main__content div.toggle {
  font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  line-height: 2.6rem;
  color: #cc0633;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: inline-block;
  width: 100%; }
  .main__content div.toggle:hover {
    color: #cc0633; }
  .main__content div.toggle:before {
    font-family: "FontAwesome";
    content: "\f067";
    width: 3rem;
    float: left; }
  .main__content div.toggle.open:before {
    content: "\f068"; }
  .main__content div.toggle h1, .main__content div.toggle h2, .main__content div.toggle h3, .main__content div.toggle h4, .main__content div.toggle h5, .main__content div.toggle p, .main__content div.toggle span {
    font-family: "FFDINProCondBlack";
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    line-height: 2.6rem;
    letter-spacing: normal;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #414042;
    display: inline-block;
    width: calc(100% - 3rem); }
    .main__content div.toggle h1:hover, .main__content div.toggle h2:hover, .main__content div.toggle h3:hover, .main__content div.toggle h4:hover, .main__content div.toggle h5:hover, .main__content div.toggle p:hover, .main__content div.toggle span:hover {
      color: #cc0633; }
  .main__content div.toggle.open h1, .main__content div.toggle.open h2, .main__content div.toggle.open h3, .main__content div.toggle.open h4, .main__content div.toggle.open h5, .main__content div.toggle.open p {
    color: #cc0633; }
  .main__content div.toggle span {
    text-transform: none; }
  .main__content div.toggle p {
    text-transform: uppercase; }

.main__content div.toggleContent {
  display: none;
  padding-left: 6.5rem;
  padding-left: 2.8rem;
  margin-left: 3.5rem;
  border-left: 2px solid #e6e7e8; }
  .main__content div.toggleContent.open {
    display: block; }
